column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////We had a flight of Scotch that came with a dropper of water
column2: so it was fun to experiment there. Also ordered a pale wheat beer which was light
column3: crisp and delicious. The service was incredible
column4: my water glass never reached half full
column5: our server was funny and helpful and we had a manager stop by. The service was wonderful overall. The DJ was spinning a lot of really fun music too. We definitely enjoyed our evening and look forward to coming back when we're in town. Great restaurant!
